name: assessor-financeiro
description: Assessor Financeiro + Assistente de Agenda via WhatsApp com Dashboard Web

scripts.migrate: docker compose exec backend npm run migrate
scripts.seed: docker compose exec -T db psql -U assessor_user -d assessor < db/seeds/001_sample_data.sql
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
